mapper.select: select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm') as 년월, sum(o.pamount*p.price) as 매출 from orderInfo o inner join product p on o.pnum = p.pnum group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm') order by 1;
SELECT pname,ordercount FROM ( SELECT pname, ordercount FROM product ORDER BY ordercount DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5;
